faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating magical stories with PetTalesAI
faq.answer1: PetTalesAI uses advanced AI technology to create personalized children's books featuring your pets. Simply create character profiles for your pets and family members, choose your story preferences, and our AI will generate a unique book with custom illustrations and storytelling tailored to your pets.
faq.question2: What information do I need to provide about my pet?
faq.answer2: For the best results, provide your pet's name, type (dog, cat, etc.), breed, physical characteristics like fur color and markings, and personality traits. You can also upload photos to help our AI create more accurate illustrations. The more details you provide, the more personalized your story will be.
faq.question3: How long does it take to create a book?
faq.answer3: Book creation typically takes 3-5 minutes. Our AI generates the story, creates custom illustrations, and formats everything into a beautiful book layout. You'll receive notifications when your book is ready for download.
faq.question4: What formats are available for download?
faq.answer4: All books are available as high-quality PDF files optimized for both digital viewing and printing. The PDFs are designed to print beautifully on standard home printers or at professional print shops.
faq.question5: Can I edit the story after it's created?
faq.answer5: Yes! You can edit both the story text and regenerate illustrations if you're not satisfied with the results. You also have the option to regenerate individual pages or the entire book with different settings.
faq.question6: Is my personal information and pet photos secure?
faq.answer6: Absolutely. We take privacy seriously and use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Your photos and personal information are encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal data with third parties.
faq.answer7: Currently, PetTalesAI supports English and Spanish. You can create stories in either language, and our AI will generate appropriate content and illustrations for your chosen language.
faq.question8: How much does it cost to create a book?
faq.answer8: PetTalesAI uses a credit-based system. Creating a book typically costs between 50-100 credits depending on the length and complexity. You can purchase credits in flexible packages starting from $5. Character creation and gallery browsing are always free.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: At PetTalesAI, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered children's book creation service.
introduction.content2: By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.item1: Name and email address when you create an account
personal.item3: Payment information for credit purchases (processed securely through Stripe)
personal.item4: Contact information when you reach out to our support team

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.item1: Information about how you use our service, including books created and characters added
usage.item2: Photos and descriptions of your pets and family members for book creation
usage.item3: Preferences and settings you configure in your account

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.item1: IP address, browser type, and device information
technical.item2: Cookies and similar tracking technologies for authentication and preferences
technical.item3: Log data including access times and pages visited

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.item1: To provide and maintain our AI book creation service
howWeUse.item2: To process payments and manage your credit balance
howWeUse.item3: To personalize your experience and improve our service
howWeUse.item4: To communicate with you about your account and our service
howWeUse.item5: To provide customer support and respond to your inquiries
howWeUse.item6: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content1: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:
informationSharing.item1: Service providers who assist us in operating our service (such as payment processing and cloud hosting)
informationSharing.item2: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
informationSharing.item3: In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
informationSharing.item4: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataSecurity.content2: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.item1: Access and update your personal information through your account settings
yourRights.item2: Request deletion of your account and associated data
yourRights.item4: Request a copy of your personal data
yourRights.item5: Contact us to exercise any of these rights

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how our service is used.
cookies.content2: You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our service is designed for families and may be used by children under parental supervision. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental consent. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using PetTalesAI

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to PetTalesAI! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our AI-powered children's book creation service operated by PetTalesAI ('we', 'us', or 'our').
introduction.content2: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access the service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the service.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.content1: PetTalesAI provides an AI-powered platform for creating personalized children's books featuring your pets and family members. Our service includes:
serviceDescription.item1: Character creation tools for pets and family members
serviceDescription.item4: PDF generation for printing and sharing

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content1: To use certain features of our service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
userAccounts.item2: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
userAccounts.item3: All activities that occur under your account
userAccounts.item4: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

payment.title: Payment and Credits
payment.content1: Our service operates on a credit-based system. By purchasing credits, you agree to the following:
payment.item1: All payments are processed securely through Stripe
payment.item2: Credits are non-refundable except as required by law
payment.item3: Credits do not expire but are tied to your account
payment.item4: Prices may change with notice, but existing credits remain valid
payment.item5: Failed book generations will result in automatic credit refunds

userContent.title: User Content and Intellectual Property
userContent.content1: You retain ownership of the content you provide (photos, descriptions, etc.) and the books you create using our service.
userContent.content2: By using our service, you grant us a limited license to use your content solely for providing the service. You represent that:
userContent.item1: You own or have the right to use all content you provide
userContent.item2: Your content does not violate any third-party rights
userContent.item3: Your content is not illegal, harmful, or offensive
userContent.item4: You will not use our service to create inappropriate content involving minors

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts. Prohibited uses include:
prohibitedUses.item1: Creating content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, or offensive
prohibitedUses.item3: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
prohibitedUses.item4: Using our service to spam or harass others
prohibitedUses.item5: Creating content that exploits or harms children
prohibitedUses.item6: Reverse engineering or attempting to extract our AI models

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content1: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by PetTalesAI and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of our service without our express written permission.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content1: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
disclaimers.content2: AI-generated content may not always meet your expectations, and we cannot guarantee the quality or accuracy of generated stories and illustrations.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, PetTalesAI shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on our website. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which PetTalesAI operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

social.description: Follow us on social media for updates, tips, and inspiration for creating amazing pet stories.
